aa_space.description: Integrative educational social project to support people in recovery, with a closed forum and chat system (Angular + backend).

experimenta-ai---soneca.description: Full management system for snack bars with Clean Architecture, Java 17, modular Spring Boot, Angular 17+, and MySQL.

first-angular-app.description: Task management system in Angular 19 with standalone components, services, reactive forms, routing, and local persistence.

investment_calculator.description: Investment calculator in Angular 18 with compound interest projections, Signals, and year-by-year results.

lobby-pedidos.description: Order lobby migrated from React to Angular and integrated with a snack bar's core production app (marked for deletion).

lol-matchmaking-fazenda.description: End-to-end scalable system for queue, matchmaking, draft, player management, and leaderboard with automations for Discord and LoL.

mercearia-r-v.description: Complete cash register, inventory, and sales system with reports and advanced features, developed as a service swap.

obaid-with-bro.description: Obaid 2.0 — AI chatbot for pranks, built to practice AI API integration using Spring Boot and Angular.

pintarapp.description: App to import and color SVGs on a tablet; ongoing project worked on when time allows.

traffic_manager.description: Real-time monitoring dashboard in Angular 18 with standalone components, Signals, and a ticketing system.

wmakeouthill.description: Repository containing my GitHub profile README.

wmakeouthill.github.io.description: Full-stack portfolio (Java 17 + Spring Boot + Angular 20) with AI chat; backend fetches content dynamically from GitHub; deployed on GitHub Pages and Google Cloud Run.

planning_poker.description: Full-Stack Web Application for Agile Estimation with Planning Poker (2 Voting Modes) and Notion-Style Collaborative Boards. Java 21 + Spring Boot  Angular 21 + TypeScript

regua_maxima_app.description: Full-Stack Portfolio Application for Barbershop Management, built with Java 17 + Spring Boot and Angular 20 + Ionic + Capacitor. Features include a backend with JWT authentication, REST API, and geolocation, and a hybrid mobile frontend offering appointment scheduling, customer reviews, and barber–barbershop association.

teleprompter_stealth_mode.description: Electron desktop application for invisible and discreet teleprompter, ideal for online meetings, OBS Studio recordings, and live presentations. Supports Markdown, configurable auto-scroll, adjustable transparency, and multiple screens.

desafio_fullstack.description: Fullstack web application for automatic email classification using AI. Angular 20+ frontend with Signals, FastAPI backend, support for OpenAI GPT and Google Gemini. Interactive chat interface with file upload (.txt, .pdf, .eml, .msg, .mbox).

chrome_extensao_skip_video.description: High-performance extension for automating skip of short videos to prevent automatic looping (Shorts/Reels/TikTok), developed with pure JavaScript, Manifest V3, event-driven architecture, and zero polling.

experimenta_ai_soneca_delivery.description: Complete delivery and real-time tracking system developed with Clean Architecture, Java 17, modular Spring Boot, Angular 17+, Google Maps API, and MySQL.

glm-4.7-down-config-pc-fraco.description: Automated scripts to install and configure GLM-4.7 AI model on low-end PCs. Supports multiple quantizations (Q2-Q5), CPU/GPU offloading, and cross-platform setup (Windows/Linux/Mac). Optimized for limited hardware resources.
